introduction: In this video, Anar discusses the reasons for moving from quality assurance to software development and provides guidance on how to do it. He emphasizes the importance of enjoying coding or solving problems and having a basic understanding of programming concepts before making the transition. Anar also shares his personal experience of building a test automation framework and transitioning to software development within his company. He encourages viewers to approach their managers, express their interest in software development, and showcase their web development skills to increase their chances of finding a job in the field.

sections.title: Section 1: Why Move to Software Development?
content: Exploring the perceived prestige of software development.
Discussing the reasons for moving from software testing to software development.
Emphasizing the importance of enjoying coding or solving problems.
Highlighting the need for a basic grasp of programming concepts.

sections.title: Section 2: Test Automation and Personal Projects
content: Discussing the importance of test automation in software development.
Explaining the design pattern for test automation scripts.
Sharing personal experience with test automation and personal projects.
Recommending talking to software development colleagues for help.

sections.title: Section 3: Building a Test Automation Framework
content: Explaining the process of building a test automation framework.
Sharing personal experience of building a test automation framework.
Discussing the value of a well-built test automation framework.
Recommending picking a personal project relevant to the application at work.

sections.title: Section 4: Approaching Managers and Showcasing Web Development Skills
content: Discussing the importance of approaching managers and expressing interest in software development.
Emphasizing the need to be polite and continue doing the job well.
Sharing personal experience of showcasing web development skills to a manager.
Recommending getting an answer or action plan from the manager.

sections.title: Section 5: Transitioning to Software Development
content: Sharing personal experience of transitioning to software development within a company.
Discussing the importance of having professional experience and a personal project.
Recommending looking outside the company for job opportunities.
Emphasizing the benefits of having web development skills.
